import React, { Component }from "react"; import { Menu, Button, Segment} from 'semantic-ui-react' import {Router, Route, NavLink, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; class NavBar extends Component{ state = { activeItem: "home" } handleItemClick = (e, {name}) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return (
{ !this.props.currentUser ? : {`Welcome, ${this.props.currentUser.name}!`} Log out }
) } } export default NavBar;
